Such good food in a cozy restaurant that even has captured the classic restaurant music such as old covers presented by Wael Jassar that you would expect. reviews.title: Mr N rudd

reviews.text:
Me and my family ate here for the last night of out holiday.

The setting for the restaurant is lovely placed towards the end of the marina. As we sat we were greeted by our waiter Ahmed, who was really friendly and well spoken as were the rest of the staff.
 One of the parts I really likes about the restaurant is that they're were a few cats and a stray dog that Ahmed had given a bath and was putting food and water down for them just outside of the restaurant. (I'm a big animal lover and I'd seen a few other restaurants in the marina chasing the strays away) 

We had a few cocktails which were okay (could do with some little more liquor) but nice non the less and were very reasonably priced. Â£3 for a mohito.

When the food arrived we were all very impressed. I had the fillet steak which was 400g and cost around Â£11.
It was cooked to absolute perfection.

After our meal we moved to the open shisha area where we received a free shot and had another bottle of wine with some shisha which was also very good, probably the best I'd had on my trip.

All on all it was a great experience and I'd recommend anyone that goes to hurgarda to take a visit
reviews.title: Excellent place to eat.

reviews.text:
On our penultimate day of our holiday in Hurgarda, we decided to visit the marina. After a lovely stroll, we choose The Greek restaurant to have our lunch. We were not disappointed, after starters of Halumi cheese & stuffed vine leaves, we both chose the chicken gyros. The food was delicious & we were given some garlic bread in between the starter & main. We finished by sharing a dessert. On paying our bill we were given shots of ice cold ouzo, which went down a treat.
If your lucky enough to visit the marina, pop into the Greek & enjoy great food & service.

reviews.text:
Amazing Sushi and staff!!

Visited Red Dragon twice on our visit to Hurghada and easily the best dining experience we had the whole trip.

First visit we had Miso soup, duck and vegetable spring rolls, and as mains 1) Shrimp noodles and 2) crispy chicken noodles. The food was excellent and we were very pleased.  This was followed by cocktails which were also great (I love Mojitos with sugar rather than only syrup!!) 

Although the first visit was hard to beat, our second visit was even better as we ordered miso soup followed by the 50 piece sushi platter. The sushi was excellent and fresh, by far the best I have had in a long time. We were very full and the sushi was packed up with a pot of soy sauce to take back to our hotel so we could finish it later! 

From the excellent food and very kind staff, I absolutely recommend Red Dragon for food or cocktails, I noticed they do shisha too. 

Thank you again to all staff at Red Dragon for such a great experience

Liam
reviews.title: Amazing experience - Great food and staff

reviews.text:
We visited the marina on one evening of our holiday to Hurghada and were excited to try something different to the hotel all inclusive. 

We were a party of 9; 5 adults, a six year old, two toddlers and a baby. 

Every restaurant on the street promises the world to try and encourage you to choose them. 
We decided to dine here as it offered a range of food to suit us all. 
However, when over two hours later we were still waiting for our food we knew weâ€™d made a mistake. 
We ordered prawn crackers, there were none. Then all ordered starters and mains as well as three kids meals. 

The kids meals arrived quickly. But the rest of the food did not. 
There were other people complaining for needing to wait also. Donâ€™t encourage people into the restaurant if you canâ€™t cater for them. We kept being assured â€˜five more minutesâ€™ but with four extremely bored children this wasnâ€™t good enough. Eventually  after almost two and a half hours the food came, with items missing, and was average at best. 

On top of this, there were no baby change facilities so had to change my little girl on the dirty toilet floor. 
People smoke inside of the restaurant as itâ€™s classed as outdoors which I just donâ€™t like at all. 

Wouldnâ€™t recommend.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text:
Despite a good location on the marina , yet they were not up to my expectations â€¦  let me tell you why  
1. No bread and butter or some crackers to start with as in high end restaurants ! 
2. I ordered seafood soup â€¦ small bowl very average ingredients and nothing special about it .
3. I ordered Maritime seafood salad expecting a signature salad from the chef â€¦ It was literally Egyptian green salad ( Baladi salad) with some shrimps and calamari shreds and mussels sprinkled on its surface â€¦ very novice way to say ! 
4. main course was seafood platter .. that was very good but not outstanding .. an average piece of Salmon , one white fish fillet, 2 large shrimps and some fried rings of calamari with 2 small cups of sweet red chili sauce and tartar sauce and One side item only .. the taste was good .
5. I had crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e for dessert and was good 
6. I paid including 8% tip what is equivalent $ 50 / person 
So my advise if you go there â€¦ donâ€™t order soup or salad .. too expensive for a very average quality and go right to their main course and some dessert .. next time in Gouna I will go somewhere else for seafood dinner ! I was not thrilled despite high rate on TripAdvisor !
reviews.title: Average seafood restaurant

reviews.text:
What can I say....

We came to Granada Restaurant and Bar for my girlfriends birthday. 

The staff were exceptional from the moment of entering the restaurant. 

They sat us at the perfect table to overlook the bay at sunset.  

They were kind enough to prepare balloons and complementary dessert whilst all gathering to sing happy birthday to my girlfriend in both English and Arabic. 

The staff also presented a small flower arrangement which was a welcome surprise.

Throughout the evening,  they went above and beyond,  ensuring our glasses were never empty and that we were enjoying ourselves. 

A particular thank you goes to Mohammed ( shisha man) and Kamar. Both are a credit to the establishment.  

I would particularly recommend the mixed fajita and my girlfriend would recommend the 4 cheese pizza. 

We look forward to returning to Granada on our next trip to Hurghada.  

Thank you all once again
reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service

reviews.text: Had a lovely meal here on Monday night and returned tonight. The staff are really helpful and friendly and the food was of a very high standard. I'd recommend the salmon teriyaki or the beijing duck, very tasty and great value for money.

Naughty service for a usually very good place.
Our grown up children and their partners visited Friday eve. 
For an 800LE bill it wasnâ€™t much to start with u til the waiter returned to say 100le short and also another bill was torn so could t be accepted.
Neither were true as we have only just had our money from the bank all in 100â€™s.

Luckily for the waiter they didnâ€™t cause a fuss and paid the alleged missing 100 and replaced the torn 100.

I do not think this will be the last time an individual waiter tries to make a little extra.

Usually this place would always get 5stars but people need to be aware and see the managers when this happened.
reviews.title: Short changing at a usually reliable establishment

reviews.text:
My favorite restaurant in Gouna.  Very delicious menu.  Love the grilled chicken, their pizzas, and sumptuous salads.

What makes La Playa exceptional is their staff who are extremely professional and friendly.  Mohamed Refaat has been serving  us lately. Heâ€™s very friendly and courteous. Itâ€™s always a pleasure to see him.

We were there for a spontaneous dinner and can only recommend it! Nice atmosphere! The service was quick and courteous, the food came quickly and was very delicious. The burger combinations are well put together (we had the Mango Chicken Burger and the Halloumi Guacamole Burger) and taste great! The fries are crispy and you get a choice of 6 sauces that you can take as much as you want, at no extra charge. The drinks are also highly recommended, we had a really nice chat with the manager who was also very accommodating and friendly!

Full recommendation, 5 stars!
reviews.title: Great Service, great food

reviews.text: Great place to go for drinks and/or a proper burger! The staff is very friendly and the vibe is really good and relaxed. Definitely worth visiting!

reviews.text:
Nice Restorant and really good Ambience, the Burger I had was good Average. The paper on the plate should be taken away as you tend to eat a good bunch of it when cutting the burger which is too big to eat in the hand.

A Lot of Kite people there and quite a special crowd. 

Got very crowded in the end and I was asked to leave my table to create more space(I was originally seated on a four person high table in the corner) and subsequently was placed at the bar with no service and also no desert delivered although orders (only git the espresso). Finally paid and left as this was physically (no space for knees) and practically (chaos and no more service) not too encouraging.
reviews.title: Light and shadow

owner_response.text:

reviews.text: Just slightly off the main area of El Gouna across one of the many bridges over the lagoons is the Grill. It is a quiet area and you can usually easily get a table. reviews.text: My wife and I had a first class dinner at The Grill el Gouna.  We were warmly welcomed on arrival and our drinks came quickly. The food was excellent and had big portions. I started with calamari and my wife with hummus both followed by the Filet Mignon served on a sizzling black skillet with delicious fried potatoes. The home made flat bread was so light but after two lovely courses, we could eat no more. The owner, Anke, gave us great attention and service and we look forward to the next visit

reviews.text:
My name is Ana, I am from Romania (Cluj) and I was in Egypt for the first time with two friends (Nicoleta and Aura) .... on vacation. We stayed at Steigenberger Pure Lifestyle ... a unique experience of quality, diversity and discretion. High quality services, excellent and diverse food, and its quality and staff services to the highest standards. What I really liked (among all the others ...) was the discretion of the staff that I didn't see, but that mysteriously appeared when we needed something.
As for Alex Beach Club & Restaurant ... I just fell in love. Top quality food, impeccable service, extremely pleasant and attentive staff .... I have no words ..... the special evening was magical ...... For the services and attention of the staff I have only words of praise , but I liked the services offered by Roshdy Mohab the most .... the nicest and most attentive bartender. Every day at the beach was magical with Roshdy Mohab, who from day one taught us her name, who smiled and talked to us .... extremely nice and polite and who did it in such a way that we didn't miss it. nothing and feel like the most spoiled people on the beach. The manager - Alex Beach Club & Restaurant - should take great care of "Our Roshdy" :)), because I will return to Steigenberger Pure Lifestyle for everything he has given me ... but mostly for Roshdy Mohab . Greetings Roshdy Mohab!
reviews.title: An unforgettable vacation....

Can tell the owner is passionate about the restaurant, and serving quality food.

We'll be back next time we're in El Gouna.

reviews.text:
We have been visiting this restaurant ever since Maged and his team have owned it.  We visit mostly as a couple but have had several nights where we have been in groups of up to 18 guests.

We have never been disappointed at all. Service is excellent with great attention to detail.   The food is second to none and great value for money given the portion sizes.  There is a great choice of food to cater for all tastes. Last night we had garlic mushrooms and prawn cocktail to start.  Amazing.  Followed up by quality beef and Yorkshire puddings with great tasting gravy and proper creamed horseradish.   My partner said his T-Bone was then best steak he had eaten in years.  All this washed down with very cold drinks and then banana cheesecake and chocolate fondant with ice cream - a true must for any chocolate lovers!!

I would give Puddleduck's 10 out of 5 if I could.  Highly recommended and will remain as a firm favourite of ours in El Gouna. 

Pay them a visit - you won't be disappointed.

reviews.text:

The cocktails are great and have a good price. Made with fresh ingredients, best we tasted so far. Food is really good and the portions are big.
Most importantly, the hospitality of this place is outstanding. We really love how Mahmoud and his team make you feel welcome. The hospitality and interest in their guests is sincere and you can feel, see, and taste the passion for their job.
Special thanks to Mahmoud who made our visits so far extra enjoyable. See you tomorrow!

Angela & Kitty

reviews.text: We were going to Sumo House nearly already fed, expecting disappointment as literally every asian noodle shop in Egypt is the same combination of soy sauce and indomie or curry and indomie yet again or worse. We were surprised to have our expectations shattered by actually great food with a unique savory taste. Our host, Fatma, was a shining star on top. She was very friendly and a cheery face that greeted us, talked us through the menu and shared her own opinions and other opinions as well on each dish and what would better suit our tastes! Her advice was well-given as the plates we have selected from her top choices were marvelous (except my own plate which I stubbornly selected from her bottom recommendations... should have known better). I think the restaurant was under-staffed as Fatma was doing all jobs around us from serving us drinks, to teaching my retro parents how to hold chopsticks as well as serving other tables and running between the different Asian restaurants on site to get refreshments. The hard work atmosphere did not dampen her spirits and she worked hard to make sure we were more than just satisfied with our meal. 10/10 would come again.
reviews.title: Great meal! Greater host

Staff were lovely on both visits, service was outstanding and the food was the best ever. 

Thank you.

reviews.text: Came here twice during my holiday in Egypt. Both times the food was amazing. Not only that the staff were so friendly and attentive. We went out for my wives birthday. There were 14 of us In total. We walked in and asked for a table. Within seconds it felt they had made up a table ready for us. And the food was to die for. I have eaten at a lot of places and this restaurant is top of my list. The presentation was amazing and the price very good considering how great the staff were and the quality of food on offer. The second visit the place was packed so was told go away for 10 minutes while they made up a table. True to their word 9 minutes later after a bit of shopping we went back to a perfectly dressed table waiting for us. We thought due to how busy it was we would have a worse service. No food took similar times to come out and all together so we could eat as a group. My only regret is I didnâ€™t get a chance to eat out more here and try out more of the menu. I was very happy with my experience and would highly recommend anyone who may visit to eat here as they wonâ€™t be let down. Thankyou for such a great service and brilliant food

reviews.text:
We came across this restaurant by chance whilst strolling around Town â€¦.
We most certainly werenâ€™t disappointedâ€¦
We visit Italy a lot and this is very authentic..
Itâ€™s run by a lovely Italian lady and her daughter and son-in-law â€¦.
The restaurant was busy â€¦ there was a big table of about 20 arrive after us but the service was excellent â€¦ we were waited on by ABDUL and MAGDY who were fabulousâ€¦ they were very attentive and friendly and they asked us when we were ready for each courseâ€¦.it was lovely to feel relaxed while eating and not feel pressured to eat and goâ€¦
The food was outstanding â€¦ my pepper fillet steak was one of the best Iâ€™ve eaten â€¦
We were also very impressed at how quickly they got all the meals out at the same time for the large table â€¦. 
They also sell branded Italian drinks here â€¦ Aperole, Negroni, Amoretto, Lemoncello, Expresso Martini and Bailyâ€™s â€¦.
It was also lovely that the owners came and spoke to all of their customers during the eveningâ€¦ again typically Italian â€¦

Would highly recommend you visit this restaurant whilst in El Gouna if you love fabulous authentic Italian food â€¦
There is a service and tax charge added to the bill but we still felt we got good value for money for the food, service and experienceâ€¦
reviews.title: Excellent Authentic Italian!

reviews.text: Fabulous evening out at Aqua restaurant, part of the Jaz hotel chain. We have eaten out at some of the other restaurants in the chain and whilst the food was nice the service has not lived up to 5 star. Our waiter was Deif was brilliant, he really understood what good service meant, knowing when to be attentive and when to step away. We loved his pink panther cocktails too! The food was excellent, we had the beef fillet and also the surf and turf. In between courses we was treated to giant prawns and also a visit from the chef who was very polite and friendly. We are already looking forward to coming back to Aqua tomorrow for lunch, to enjoy the great food and beach views.
reviews.title: Fabulous evening at Aqua restaurant

reviews.text: Our family of 11, aged 8 to 72, had a lovely evening in this delightful restaurant in a beautiful setting . Located on the beach a short walk from the Jaz Makadi Oasis rooms. The staff were courteous and very attentive. The steaks were great as was the Red Sea Fish (similar to Bass) . Food  presentation was classy and the tiramisu was seriously the best I have had . Light, tasty and incredibly moreish! Every step during our 3 course meal was delivered by the waiting staff in a professional and engaging manner . Well done to all, we had a lovely evening and the menus with lights are a great idea !!

reviews.text:
We visited last night, wow... the bill came to 550 E.L!!! And the food portion and quality were out of this world.

We had massively over ordered and the waiter was very honest, which we really respected as we asked for over a kilo of prawns lobster and calamari ... along with the mixed seafood pasta, ( we had it in white source lots of prawns And calamari very tasty and about 100 E.L). Mixed fish soup, prawns cocktail, and then all our fresh fish

So the man being very honest said get 300g of two, it's a lot of food. We valued this as there have been places where we felt money was the value of the transaction!. Which you have to understand while in Hurghada, they egyptian people work EXTREMELY HARD! So tip your hotel staff, ( who work 7.30am-6pm, 7 DAYS A WEEK FOR A MONTH! And then can go home and see the family for a week. The waiting staff and hospitality staff also work long times and shifts. We ended up leaving 120  E.L after our meal as it was great.

So what we actually ended up ordering: 

Prawns cocktail- ridiculous price about 40. E.L!
Mixed seafood soup- big variety of fish.
The mixed seafood pasta- very generous portion.
Fresh Calamari- 250g - very good calamari.
The fresh prawns- 500g- huge and juicy king prawns!
They brought out two plates of dip and a huge basket of fresh bread, which were still hot that level of fresh! 
Oh and 1Ã— water and 2Ã—coke.

We over ordered but had a good go and so impressed! 

The comments we have seen on here that have some negatives, a few seem to be about decoration. Its not a five star restaurant inside, don't get me wrong, me and my finance love eating out, from Michelin to small and local, and will try anything. But if your fussy enough to be bothered it's basic, for the price, and it being local... your being picky. It also does not serve alcohol, but the service is quick... so have the best seafood near the marina, and go for lovely drinks on the actual marina.

 Which brings me to the most important point, location ... ITS NOT ON THE MARINA ITS BEHIND IT! Don't do what we did and walk it twice looking in every alley haha ! Walk to the end of the marina so you can enjoy the views, have a drink, eye up a shisha for after. When you get past waves to the end, ask the man with his camel or little candy shops for the restaurants they will guide you out. 

From the bottom end of the marina,( near waves ), you can also walk through the bizarre  before it and get out that entrance. There are some taxi and a round about. Turn right round the round about up past the fresh fish. About four shops up you arrive. Enjoy. 

If fish and quality is your thing, make sure you visit!
reviews.title: Best fish and lowest price for amazing freshness and portion sizes!

name: Chicha Restaurant & Bar
address: Opposite Ebeid Supermarket, El Gouna, Hurghada 00000 Egypt
rankingString: #52 of 534 places to eat in Hurghada

reviews.text:
The food arrived quickly and it was SO tasty! So sad to have not found this restaurant sooner as I would have eaten there waaaay more often! Will for sure be returning. 

On a side note, they have THE BEST spicy margaritas!! They were so good that we returned the next day for more.
reviews.title: A MUST TRY! â­ï¸

reviews.text:
I have been hearing how good Chicha in Gouna is for past two years.  I finally got round to trying it for dinner with friends.  It did not disappoint one bit.

First things first,,, you must reserve here (especially if on a weekend night).  They are often packed.  

The first impression is of a charming atmosphere - with nice lighting and good music.  The service was friendly and professional from start to finish of our experience.  The waiters gave us good suggestions when we had questions about the menu.

And the Food !!!  All was delicious.  The Tiradito starter with a layer of white fish and a lightly cooked shrimp in an incredible sauce.  The white fish was so tasty and fresh that I decided to order the white fish taco as my main.  The shrimp risotto - that we shared - was excellent as well.  Not too much parmesan and the risotto was cooked just right.

Although its a simple place, I would definitely rate this the best restaurant in Gouna and top ten in all of Egypt.  Just don't forget to call ahead to reserve your table.
reviews.title: Must Reserve - its more than worth it.

reviews.text: This is hands down the best restaurant at El Gouna. With delicious dishes, great service, very hospitable staff, and a great Latin vibe, Chicha is beyond compare!!!
reviews.title: Best restaurant in El Gouna is Chicha

reviews.text:
Amazing food and very professional staff.

We chose one portion of nachos to share as a starter, it came with four different, yet equally delicious dips and a cheese sauce on the side.

Both our main courses came with a serving of vegetables included, which we love, but aresometimes missed in restaurants.

Most likely due to the great quality of products and amazing service I do recommend making a reservation here if you plan to dine here. Every day we walked by the restaurant was full! Thumbs up.
reviews.title: Best food & service in El Gouna!

name: Nubian Egyptian Restaurant & Cafe
address: El-Shohada, Hurghada Egypt
rankingString: #54 of 534 places to eat in Hurghada

reviews.text:
This is by far the best restaurant in Hurghada!

We celebrated our 5th anniversary here and the evening was one of the best nights I ever had.

Food is really good and authentic.

But what makes this place really special is the staff. Karim and his team will go above and beyond to make your time there really special. 

After a not so great experience at another restaurant we came back to Nubian every night and the staff welcomed us as family. 

We thank you for all the great evenings at the Nubian.

Roxana, Gabor and Sue
reviews.title: 10 stars restaurant

reviews.text:

reviews.title: Beautiful staff and people food and drinks this place is highly recommended for travelers to experience food and drinks

reviews.text:
We have been greeted by very friendly staff that showed us the menu with pictures of the food, never felt pressured to enter the restaurant at all and decided to give it a try.
Well we weren't wrong to do so!
The food was amazing, very tasty, hot with just the right amount of spices, presentation was again amazing.
Staff was very friendly, polite and helpful, happy and always asked us if we like the food, if we need something else if everything was OK with the food and drinks. We understand that it's a restaurant and it's their job to make us feel good but honestly it didn't seem like it was just a job, they actually enjoy what they do! 

Will return!
reviews.title: Best Egyptian food we had.

reviews.text: Great little place to eat and soak up the sun on the Marina. Staff were lovely. Definitely recommend the Om Ali dessert, Egypts take on the classic bread and butter pudding. Would definitely visit again.
